title: Friday Night with Niall Paterson
overview: Join Niall for a fresh look back at the news that made the headlines that week and a look ahead to the stories that might develop over the weekend.Each show will feature a high-profile guest from one of the week's big stories, and Niall will be joined by a panel in the studio to reflect on the highs and lows of the people and topics that have been leading the news agenda.In addition to the day's headlines at the top of each hour, the show will cover sports, entertainment, UK and international news â€“ with no subject off limits.
